-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Are you planning to become an Udemy paid instructor?

Have you just launched your first course on Udemy and still waiting for some profit to emerge?

Or maybe you already have a course published for some time, but you are not getting the students and earnings you wished for?

Join lots of other people who decided to turn their Udemy experience into a steady passive income source, using this free course!

"Very actionable content. No fluff very high quality content. Instructor is very clear and comes across as being very knowledgeable. I would highly recommend this course." by B.H.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update December 3, 2015: November 2015 Earnings | Black Friday 2015 - Daily Sales Statistics | My Simple and Inexpensive Setup for Recording Courses

Update November 11, 2015: Added: Tip 11: Properly Format the Course Description!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Now, I'm not going to promise you that you will earn $10k or $100k each day or each month on Udemy, nor will I tell you that you are going to become a millionaire next year. I'm not saying it's impossible, other people have done it, but not overnight, in any case. It really depends on your course content and quality, your teaching style, your care for the students and so on.

What I AM telling you is that if you follow the steps and advices in THIS tutorial, your course is going to gain more visibility on Udemy, more students and ultimately, more money. Again, not millions, like others may promise you, but surely a constant, decent, passive income. For example, I make well over $2500 in average, each month from Udemy, which I think it's pretty decent. HOW I got from my course launch to earning this much, well, that's another story, a story I'm going to share with you across this course, by giving you the best tips I learned, tested and experienced in the first 6 months after launching my course.

And the best part is that you won't have to repeat the tests and mistakes I made during this time. I will share absolutely everything I know about having and growing an Udemy course and I am planning to keep the information relevant and updated.

"Thank you for making this course. I have been struggling with this part of the process and you are making it very clear. I am looking forward to practicing these principles in my courses." by M.R.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

During this free course you will learn how to transform your Udemy course from a faded, unattractive and obscure course to a shiny, engaging selling machine:

  • See My Earnings In The First 6 Months On Udemy, With A Single Course
  • Learn How To Create The Best Course Description On Udemy
  • Learn How To Write The Course Goals On Udemy
  • Learn How To Write The Instructor Bio On Udemy
  • Learn About Udemy's Course Quality Standards

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please note that this tutorial is NOT about how to create the course itself (filming, software, lighting, video editing, audio quality). Instead, this course assumes that you already have a course in progress or already published on Udemy and you want to make the next steps to profit.

"Udemy: How To Write The Best Course Summary And Grow Sales! by Mihai Catalin Teodosiu was exactly what I was looking for. I’ve been an active student on Udemy seeking information to help me in my business which worked so well for me I’ve decided at some point to create a course myself on the niche that I’m in. So once that was decided I’ve kept my eyes open for courses on course creation so when I found this one I jumped on it. If you’re reading this you probably need this course so I recommend you just get started now." by F.F.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Important information before you enroll:

  • Once enrolled, you have unlimited, lifetime access to the course!
  • You will have instant and free access to any updates I'll add to the course.
  • I will give you my full support regarding any issues or suggestions related to the course.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Enroll NOW and turn your Udemy course into a selling machine! Let's get started!
